akabekobotan 2023 pattern notes uk crochet symbols are used throughout this pattern see http //www simplycrochetmag co uk/2013/07/04/uk-and-us-crochet-conversion- chart/ for conversions gauge is not critical but should be tight to prevent fibrefill leaking stitches used slip_stitch double_crochet invdec invisible decrease half_double_crochet treble_crochet dtr fldc front loop double_crochet fldec front loop decrease magic_ring whipped back stitch straight stitch bouillon stitch turning chains do not count as stitches invisible decrease tutorial with video https //bellacococrochet com/invisible- decrease/ front loop stitch tutorial https //craftinghappiness com/crochet-front-side-loop- stitch-for-amigurumi-toys/ whipped back stitch tutorial https //www embroidery rocksea org/stitch/back- stitch/whipped-back-stitch/ bouillon stitch tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=7ic4kaflsde where indicated use the invisible fasten_off to ensure the edge is neat http //www stitch-story com/2010/12/invisible-fasten-off-one-of-my-favorite html you can use any yarn with this project however use a smaller needle than recommended to keep gauge tight project is approximately 18cm tall each when made as directed a aziraphale body start with tan yarn foundation 6 double_crochet magic_ring round 1 2dc in each st 12 st round 2 *3dc 2dc in 1 st* repeat ** to end 15 st round 3-4 double_crochet to end of round 15 st change to light brown yarn round 5-10 double_crochet to end of round 15 st break yarn and pull through make a note of where the first stitch of the next round should be you will be working into this stitch later make the second leg like the first one up to the end of round 10 and place a marker continue working into the next round of the first leg round 11 *continue to double_crochet around the top of the first leg and across the top of the second leg 30 st round 12-13 double_crochet to end of round 30 st change to buff yarn © akabekobotan 2023 round 14-16 double_crochet to end of round 30 st round 17 *8dc invdec* repeat ** to end of round 27 st round 18-19 double_crochet to end of round 27 st round 20 4dc invdec *7dc invdec* repeat ** 3dc 24 st round 21 double_crochet to end of round 24 st round 22 *2dc invdec* repeat ** to end of round 18 st round 23 double_crochet to end of round 18 st round 24 *double_crochet invdec* repeat **
